tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE SalesData (
    sale_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    sale_date DATE,
    product_id INT,
    quantity INT,
    amount DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE sales_data (
    sale_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    product_name VARCHAR(50),
    sale_amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
    sale_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE demographic_data (
    demographic_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    city VARCHAR(50),
    state VARCHAR(2),
    age_group VARCHAR(10)
)

CREATE TABLE combined_data (
    sale_id INT,
    demographic_id INT,
    total_sales DECIMAL(10, 2),
    prediction_score DECIMAL(10, 2)
    FOREIGN KEY (sale_id) REFERENCES sales_data(sale_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (demographic_id) REFERENCES demographic_data(demographic_id)
)

CREATE TABLE sales_data (
    sale_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    product_name VARCHAR(50),
    sale_amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
    sale_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE demographic_data (
    demographic_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    city VARCHAR(50),
    state VARCHAR(50),
    age_range VARCHAR(10)
)

CREATE TABLE sales_demographic_view (
    sale_id INT,
    demographic_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (sale_id) REFERENCES sales_data(sale_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (demographic_id) REFERENCES demographic_data(demographic_id)
)

CREATE TABLE prediction_data (
    predicted_sale_amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
    predicted_date DATE
)
CREATE TABLE SalesData (    sales_id INT,    product_name TEXT,    quantity INT,    sale_date DATE,    PRIMARY KEY (sales_id) );
CREATE TABLE DemographicData (    customer_id INT,    customer_name TEXT,    age INT,    gender TEXT,    location TEXT,    PRIMARY KEY (customer_id) );

CREATE TABLE CombinedData (    sales_id INT,    customer_id INT,    product_name TEXT,    quantity INT,    sale_date DATE,    customer_name TEXT,    age INT,    gender TEXT,    location TEXT,    PRIMARY KEY (sales_id, customer_id),    FOREIGN KEY (sales_id) REFERENCES SalesData(sales_id) ON DELETE CASCADE,    FOREIGN KEY (customer_id) REFERENCES DemographicData(customer_id) ON DELETE CASCADE );

CREATE TABLE DemandPredictions (    prediction_id INT,    sales_id INT,    customer_id INT,    prediction_status TEXT,    prediction_date DATE,    prediction_value FLOAT,    PRIMARY KEY (prediction_id),    FOREIGN KEY (sales_id) REFERENCES SalesData(sales_id),    FOREIGN KEY (customer_id) REFERENCES DemographicData(customer_id) );

CREATE TABLE SalesView AS SELECT s.sales_id, s.product_name, s.quantity, s.sale_date, d.customer_name, d.age, d.gender, d.location FROM SalesData s JOIN DemographicData d ON s.sales_id = d.customer_id;
